title: ENDED-Stunning 1907 Dietsche Cobb Batting Postcard PSA 3
author: investinrookies

posts.post_title: ENDED-Stunning 1907 Dietsche Cobb Batting Postcard PSA 3
posts.post_content:
*Ended*

Incredible eye appeal for the assigned grade.  Not your typical 3, looks like a 6-7 on first glance.

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20200602/9e42255955d452c00b33f738d58d02ef.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20200602/3831fd9c3a3fba71ca96c269bdf5dc1c.jpg[/IMG]


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Amazing looking card! Good luck with the sale!
Must admit that is one clean Dietsche PC.   Not even sure why ppl grade postcards to just get brutal grades back.

[quote name="BeanTown" post=1986610]Must admit that is one clean Dietsche PC.   Not even sure why ppl grade postcards to just get brutal grades back.[/QUOTE]

to your point, I have non-postcard sized cards graded much higher than this with more issues and dont look as nice.  Suppose it might be worth it to crack and re-sub to SGC or even back to PSA if someone wanted to spend the time and money on it?
Guess I sold mine to soon.
